Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Ora pro nobis (Litanei), S. 262

1864 · LW E20 · R. 383

[IMSLP]

This piece is for organ or harmonium, but can be played effectively on the piano.

Recommended editions

  • Universal Edition · UE 17885 · Sämtliche Orgelwerke / Band 3 · ed. Martin Haselböck

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 2
